name: Imagining
content: 像你这样的人非常罕见
这是你吸引我的一部分
特殊的时间我们一起承担一起分享
I'm glad that you are mine
You showed me a better way
你带给我了不一样的心情
我希望我们之间没有距离
直到那一天抑制住泪水
Thinking of all that could be
I'm missing you ooh so much
I feel that i've been blessed
我们有一个美好的未来
That feels so right to me
It had to be like that
有时，我会觉得失去了控制
Thinking of all that could be
I'm missing you ooh so much
不久，你就会回到我身边
Thinking of all that could be
想着一切都有可能发生
I'm missing you ooh so much
Thinking of all that could be
想着一切都有可能发生
I'm missing you ooh so much
Thinking of all that could be
想着一切都有可能发生
I'm missing you ooh so much
